div.a: April 23 , 2020 Special Meeting Board of Education – Virtual
April 9 , 2020 Regular Meeting Board of Education – Virtual

div.p: Dear Newark USD Community, During this last week April, I want to take the opportunity to thank you for your dedication and support of NUSD students. This month has been unprecedented but it has been …

Estimada comunidad del Distrito Unificado de Newark, Durante esta última semana de abril, quiero aprovechar la oportunidad para agradecerles por su dedicación y apoyo a los estudiantes de NUSD. Este mes no ha tenido precedentes, …

Join us for Distance Learning Workshops for Parents on Thursdays, April 30th and May 7th. Workshops in English will take place at 9:00 a.m. via Google Hangout Join Hangouts Meet meet.google.com/yuh-fvzt-zer Join by phone +1 …
